data.title: The Towering Inferno - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The Towering Inferno with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
1974

2 hr 45 mins

Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Disaster movie starring Paul Newman and Steve McQueen in leading roles. Newman plays architect Doug Roberts who designs a tower for developer James Duncan in San Francisco. The tower is the world's tallest building and there's a special dedication ceremony coming up. However, during testing Roberts discovers the wiring is inadequate. During the party a fire breaks out. Duncan refuses to evacuate the tower, until Chief Michael O'Hallorhan arrives and orders him to do so. There are already some victims and others must be saved.
